name: Future Workshops
tag_list: iphone-app-development-agency, iphone, application, development, agency, mobile, wireless, apple, london, uk
overview:
Future Workshops has a clear mission … to be the world’s premier iPhone application development agency. Founded by CEO Matt Brooke-Smith - a former Goldman Sachs developer - Future Workshops prides itself in bringing together only the very best talent in iPhone development.

Based in London, UK, the company has worked with a wide range of clients, and enjoys a strong relationship with Apple’s engineering teams.

Future Workshops believes that the mobile era is now well and truly upon us, ushered in by the superbly disruptive force of the iPhone. Apple’s strict hardware and software policies lend themselves to a fantastic user experience, whilst enabling developers to concentrate on innovation over integration.
